_metadata.title: Gaming Context Test Phrases
_metadata.description: Gaming language that might trigger false positives. Common gaming expressions that use crisis-adjacent language.
_metadata.note: All phrases should be detected as 'none' or 'safe' priority. False positives here indicate context detection failure.

game_death.message: I died to that boss again, I'm going to lose it
I keep dying in this level over and over
That enemy just killed me for the 50th time

frustration_expression.message: Kill me now, that was such an embarrassing play
I want to end it all... this match is absolutely terrible
I'm so dead if my team sees this play

competitive_language.message: We got absolutely murdered in that game

rage_quit.message: I can't take this game anymore, I'm uninstalling
This game is making me want to throw my controller out the window

respawn_context.message: Just waiting to respawn after that death
I'll be back after this death cooldown

loss_streak.message: I've lost like ten games in a row, existence is pain
This losing streak is killing my rank
